column4: paufox, When you want to "eject" the ipod, you need to rmmod sbp2 (or is it spb2?)
paulfox, Im having problems with my ipod maybe you could help...
paulfox: I cannot writte onto my iPod... due to: HFS+-fs warning: Filesystem was not cleanly unmounted, running fsck.hfsplus is recommended.  mounting read-only.
Your best bet is to copy all your files off of it and reformat as vfat (assuming you've got a g3 or later)
